episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including the legal status of clotheslines in the USA, a secret order for Canadian engineers, the history of McDonald's Filet-O-Fish sandwich, and a footballer with an amusing name.

facts.fact: 19 states in the USA have banned the banning of clotheslines.
Canadian engineers are part of a secret order designed by Rudyard Kipling.
When McDonald's launched the Filet-O-Fish sandwich, its main competition was the Hula Burger, which was a slice of pineapple in a bun with cheese.
There is a professional footballer called Naughty Naughty who has never been sent off.
